===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|夊|𡕒|ls=ic}} (second character roughly [[ヰ]]) – two feet facing each other ([[toe-to-toe]]). Compare [[夅]], with feet pointing down. Compare also foot in [[夂]], [[夊]], [[𡕒]]. Note that the left foot has changed shape rather more than the right foot, which still resembles the form in earlier script.
